title: Create ChipGroup component using Panda Wrap
description: Create ChipGroup component that wraps Chip children for selection behavior. Uses Panda's Wrap component for layout. Props: type (single|multi), value, onChange, label?, id?, name?, plus all Wrap props (gap, etc.). Renders with role=radiogroup (single) or role=group (multi).

title: Add keyboard navigation for selectable Chips
description: Implement keyboard support: SingleSelect (radiogroup) - arrow keys navigate between chips with wrap-around, space/enter selects. MultiSelect - tab between chips, space/enter toggles selection. Focus management within ChipGroup.

title: Export ChipGroup from package index
description: Export ChipGroup component and its types from src/components/Chip/index.ts and src/index.ts

title: Create ChipGroupContext for selection state management
description: Create context to share selection state between ChipGroup and Chip children. Context should provide: type (single|multi), value, onChange, and name.

title: Add dismissable type to Chip component
description: Add dismissable prop to Chip. When true: always render X icon after content, entire chip is click target for onDismiss callback. onDismiss is required when dismissable=true. Add aria-label combining text + dismiss for accessibility.

title: Add Storybook stories for Chip types
description: Create comprehensive stories covering: dismissable chips with onDismiss, ChipGroup with single select, ChipGroup with multi select (showing check icons), keyboard navigation demos, all combinations with sizes and icons.

title: Add selectable behavior to Chip component
description: Add value prop to Chip. When inside ChipGroup: use context to determine if selected, render role=radio (single) or role=checkbox (multi), set aria-checked. For multiSelect: prepend check icon when selected (in addition to any user-provided iconBefore). Use existing _selected recipe styles via data-selected attribute.
